description: Certain devices, specifically HP and Xerox printers, and a Barracuda web content filter, may fail to authenticate against Active Directory if they do not support the new LDAP signing capabilities enforced by the recent Windows updates. This can cause issues in functionality since these devices rely on LDAP for essential operations within the network. If these devices have not been updated or configured to use LDAPS, they may break connectivity with domain controllers, leading to possible disruptions in standard office processes.
